channel.title: [Help]Running and Compiling in Ubuntu 10.04
channel.description:
I have tried everything
This is my run client .bat file i am messing up with the .sh file
[code] @ECHO OFF
TITLE TerminalX Client JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE [/code]
This is my compiler .bat, same thing [code] @echo off
title TerminalX Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause [/code]

item.title: [Help]Running and Compiling in Ubuntu 10.04
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

I have tried everything

This is my run client .bat file i am messing up with the .sh file

@ECHO OFF

TITLE TerminalX Client
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

PAUSE

This is my compiler .bat, same thing

@echo off

title TerminalX Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java

pause

Read full topic
